questions.question_text: What software is required prior to running Oracle GoldenGate in a Windows Server environment?

choices.A: Oracle Gateway software configured for that particular database platform
choices.C: Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 SP1 Redistributable Package
choices.D: Nothing, configure GoldenGate Jagent for that particular database platform.
choices.B: JDBC drivers into the GoldenGate home directory
